items.title: What Stranger Things gets right about wormholes
bullets: • Stranger Things gets right about wormholes in the fifth season of the show
• The wormhole concept emerged from Einstein's General Theory of Relativity
• Theoretical physicists still use it to explore scientific questions today
• The story is set in Indiana in a fictional town called Hawkins that gets caught up with a paranormal world

items.title: Wi-Fi advocates get win from FCC with vote to allow higher-power devices
bullets: • The FCC plans to authorize a new category of wireless devices in the 6 GHz Wi-Fi band that will be permitted to operate at higher power levels than currently allowed
• The FCC will also consider authorizing higher levels for certain wireless devices that are only allowed to operate indoors
• These devices will be required to work with geofencing systems to avoid interference with radio astronomy observatories

• Urine tech in particular has always been a staple at the show, but what’s notable this year isn’t simply the presence of this tech

items.title: Reality still matters
bullets: • The first video of the Minneapolis shooting was bad enough
• Shortly after I saw it, I had the terrible realization that there were multiple people in the clip holding their phones up
• Within minutes, a second video was all over social media, and it was even more horrifying
• In another recording, seemingly made by a neighbor, a man approaches to render aid
• As armed agents rush toward him with guns, he shouts, "I'm a physician!”
